'true' as QUERYID,
from CMS_ACTIVITY
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into CMS_ACTIVITY (ID, ACTIVITY_NAME, ACTIVITY_LEVEL, START_TIME, END_TIME,JUMP_URL, PIC_URL, STATUS, GROUP_ID,CREATE_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY) values (#{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityLevel,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{jumpUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL},#{groupId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updatedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

update CMS_ACTIVITY set STATUS = 0, UPDATE_TIME = sysdate, UPDATED_BY = 'SYSTEM' WHERE END_TIME < sysdate AND STATUS = 1
